activities.loc: MDB Check Monitor & Posted Calendar for Courtroom

result.execSummary:
This case has not been concluded. Unless a judgment of conviction is entered, the defendant is presumed innocent of all charges.

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.
result.caption: State of Wisconsin vs. Angela C Mancl

records.addlTxt:
10:58 AM Defendant Angela C Mancl in court.  Prosecuting attorney Brady James Seidlitz in court for the State of Wisconsin.  Court relates counsel has not yet been appointed.  Reset.
Adjourned initial appearance scheduled for November 9, 2022 at 10:00 am.
Office of State Public Defender Appointment of Counsel Report

ADDRESS INFO for Angela C Mancl
Current: Homeless,   (Effective: 09-21-2022)
Prior: 1111 Bluebird Ln, Elk Mound, WI 54739

Defendant shall be fingerprinted at the Barron County Sheriff's Dept., if not already done.
If represented by the Public Defender and does not have a phone, must contact the Public Defender weekly at 715-908-8473.

1:05 PM Defendant Angela C Mancl appeared by video, in custody.  Attorney Alex Kitto appeared (for today) by video for Angela C Mancl.  Prosecuting attorney Brady James Seidlitz in court for the State of Wisconsin. 

1:05  Court relates and gives appearances.
Defendant must call the public defender's office before leaving jail to determine eligibility.  If the defendant does not qualify for public defender representation, the defendant must complete a Petition for Appointment of an Attorney, Affidavit of Indigency also known as the blue form in order for the court to consider appointing an attorney; must submit before leaving justice center if she does not qualify for public defender services.
AIA set; must appear in person.

(Bond and MS scanned to jail)
Adjourned initial appearance scheduled for September 28, 2022 at 10:00 am.
